WRITING.TEXT: Can't argue that, you can't beat those. Though I will admit I enjoyed the Affair and Beach IDS' immensely; Ryan did good for coming up with ending lines, those were fun IDS' too. But yes I agree you can't beat Colin's enders.
Essentially yes, The scheduling was quite off. What's weirder is that the Season order was originally 24 Episodes, they went for 28.
They put Colin in 2nd for Hoedown; IDS came back and Colin went last for 3 of them; Mixed it up for two of the IDS' during Season 11 having Colin in Ryan's place. It's fun having the show mix it up.
It's not that they forgot, They ran out of time before they had to switch over to their fall season schedule.
Yessir. =)
July 25th starts the week, meant it that way.
I've been waiting in grueling anticipation for it since January!
We've got most likely about at least 20-30+ S12 eps coming our way, we'll have enough before CW's Fall Season. No running out here.
There are also other things. We have till October, when theCW starts airing their Fall Shows; and Whose Line's a big draw and it'll help MadTV's new start.

Well 1, They're behind in scheduling, They were supposed to start airing Season 12 episodes May 23rd, but they had EIGHT leftover episodes from Season 11 they mistakenly cutoff last year. Two, this gives more airtime to Whose Line.

Well, we should expect:
* Trailer/promos released for an upcoming episode after a new episode airs (That was at a constant last year)
* Frequent Tweets and Facebook Posts for the show, promoting the episodes.
* The Show handle ought to reach out to those who don't know the show returned, at all. There's still a staggering number of people who don't know it returned in 2013!
* The Show handle should also reach out to those who were turned off by the embarrassing 9th Season. Make them a point of the show's vast improvements. No guests haven't gotten rid of, But we've certainly gotten changes that make all the difference (More Guestless Episodes, Return of Older Games, Return of Greg/Brad)
* Frequent WLiiA promos on the Network Channel.
Recent eps came from S11 tapings therefore being classified as S11.
We need as much people to tweet this network as much as possible, this failure to promote will not stand. I will not have this show play subject to such blatant disrespect!
